sentences.en: Chimera can be reduced by induction of multiple shoots from irradiated rice seeds.
sentences.cn: 从经过辐照的水稻种子诱导多发苗可以减少嵌合体的发生.

sentences.en: Chimerism: The condition of being a genetic chimera.
sentences.cn: 嵌合现象: 成为遗传嵌合体的现象.

sentences.en: Contact with the epidermal cells of Health dentate processes, and mutual chimera.
sentences.cn: 表皮细胞接触处密生齿状突起, 且互相嵌合.

sentences.en: Efficiency will reduce the Focus cost of Chimera Shot, Aimed Shot, and Arcane Shot.
sentences.cn: 效率将会降低奇美拉射击 、 瞄准射击与奥术射击的集中值消耗.

sentences.en: I am fighting against my chimera; and I am still staying in my own figure.
sentences.cn: 我在与狂想抗争, 我停留在我自己的画像里.

sentences.en: I think Nekhorvich created a virus in chimera , and anti - virus to kill it in Bellerophon.
sentences.cn: 我认为奈科维克制造了一种凯米拉病毒, 并制造了贝拉尔芬抗毒素.

sentences.en: Is this wave of affluence a chimera or does it have solid underpinnings?
sentences.cn: 这波富裕的浪潮纯粹是海市蜃楼还是会奔流不息 呢 ?

sentences.en: Religious unity remained as much a chimera as ever.
sentences.cn: 宗教统一仍然和从前一样，不过是个妄想。

sentences.en: Sean: Hunt's target will be the Chimera stored and manufactured at Biocyte on the 42 nd floor.
sentences.cn: 肖恩: 享特的目标是42楼上存储和生产的凯米拉病毒.

sentences.en: Single chimera light pink two - tone fluted star. Plain, pointed. Large.
sentences.cn: 单瓣深浅不一的亮粉红色星形缟花, 花瓣端有凹痕. 平坦尖型叶.大型.

sentences.en: The seedlings arised from shoot crttage consisted of three types : Chinese white poplar similitudes ( 88 % ) , simon poplar ( 2.6 % ) and chimera ( 9.4 % ) .
sentences.cn: 扦插成苗后发生分离,其中88%为类似毛白杨,2.6%为杂杨, 9.4% 仍为嵌合体.

sentences.en: The synthetic chimera polypeptide was confirmed by Edman degradation and MALDI TOF mass spectroscopy.
sentences.cn: 合成的嵌合体用Edman降解和MALDITOF质谱鉴定.

sentences.en: We'll be doing some improvements to Chimera Shot.
sentences.cn: 我们会对奇美拉射击做些强化.

trans.tran_cn: （由几种动物的各部分构成的）假想的怪兽，不可能实现的想法，幻想，妄想
trans.tran_en: A chimera is an unrealistic idea that you have about something or a hope that you have that is unlikely to be fulfilled
